france.title: Boeuf Bourguignon
france.desc: A slow-cooked beef stew braised in red wine, with mushrooms, onions, carrots, and herbs. A rich and comforting French classic.

france.title: Coq au Vin
france.desc: Chicken braised in red wine, with mushrooms, onions, garlic, and herbs. A rustic French dish full of flavor.

france.title: Ratatouille
france.desc: A medley of seasonal vegetables like eggplant, zucchini, and peppers, stewed with garlic and olive oil. A light yet flavorful dish from Provence.

france.title: Quiche Lorraine
france.desc: A savory pie made with eggs, cream, bacon, and cheese. This iconic French dish is perfect for brunch or a light meal.

france.title: Soupe à l'Oignon
france.desc: A deeply flavorful French onion soup made from caramelized onions, beef stock, and topped with melted cheese and toasted bread.

italy.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
italy.desc: A creamy, cheesy Roman pasta dish made with eggs, Pecorino Romano, pancetta, and pepper. Fast, comforting, and so satisfying.

italy.title: Margherita Pizza
italy.desc: A Neapolitan classic topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil. Simple ingredients, bold Italian flavor.

italy.title: Lasagna alla Bolognese
italy.desc: Layered pasta sheets with rich meat ragù, béchamel, and Parmigiano-Reggiano. A comforting baked favorite from Emilia-Romagna.

italy.title: Risotto alla Milanese
italy.desc: Creamy saffron-infused risotto from Milan, traditionally served with ossobuco or enjoyed on its own.

italy.title: Tiramisu
italy.desc: A beloved Italian dessert with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream, dusted with cocoa.

japan.title: Chicken Teriyaki
japan.desc: Juicy grilled chicken glazed in a sweet-savory teriyaki sauce, served with steamed rice and sesame seeds. A classic crowd-pleaser.

japan.title: Sushi Platter
japan.desc: A colorful selection of nigiri and maki rolls with fresh salmon, tuna, shrimp, and vegetables. A beautiful harmony of taste and texture.

japan.title: Ramen
japan.desc: A comforting bowl of Japanese noodle soup with rich broth, sliced pork, soft-boiled egg, and nori. Perfectly slurpable.

japan.title: Onigiri
japan.desc: Hand-shaped rice balls filled with pickled plum, salmon, or tuna, wrapped in nori. A popular portable snack in Japan.

japan.title: Miso Soup
japan.desc: A traditional soup made from fermented soybean paste, dashi broth, tofu, and seaweed. Light, warm, and nourishing.

mexico.title: Tacos al Pastor
mexico.desc: Marinated pork cooked on a vertical spit with pineapple, served on corn tortillas with onion, cilantro, and salsa.

mexico.title: Chiles en Nogada
mexico.desc: Stuffed poblano peppers topped with walnut sauce, pomegranate seeds, and parsley. A patriotic and flavorful dish.

mexico.title: Tamales
mexico.desc: Corn dough filled with meat, vegetables, or sweet flavors, wrapped in corn husks and steamed to perfection.

mexico.title: Pozole
mexico.desc: A hearty traditional soup made with hominy and pork, topped with shredded lettuce, radish, oregano, and lime.

mexico.title: Mole Poblano
mexico.desc: A rich, dark sauce made with chiles, chocolate, spices, and nuts, traditionally served over turkey or chicken.

tunisia.title: Couscous Tunisien
tunisia.desc: A national dish made from steamed semolina, spiced vegetables, and tender lamb or fish, served with rich tomato sauce.

tunisia.title: Brik à l'œuf
tunisia.desc: Crispy fried pastry filled with egg, tuna, capers, and parsley. A traditional appetizer with a perfect golden crunch.

tunisia.title: Ojja Merguez
tunisia.desc: Spicy tomato and harissa stew with poached eggs and grilled merguez sausage. A warming dish served with bread.

tunisia.title: Lablabi
tunisia.desc: A hearty chickpea soup flavored with garlic, cumin, harissa, and olive oil, topped with pieces of bread and egg.

tunisia.title: Kaak Warka
tunisia.desc: A delicate Tunisian pastry ring filled with almond paste and scented with rose water. Light, fragrant, and sweet.
